actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, S. Rept. 93-236.

actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: An original bill to authorize a Federal payment for the planning of a transit line in the median of the Dulles Airport Road and for a feasibility study of rapid transit to Friendship International Airport.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make Federal payments for the planning of a transit line in the median of the Dulles Airport Road. Authorizes a payment for a feasibility study of rapid transit to Friendship International Airport.

titles.title: An original bill to authorize a Federal payment for the planning of a transit line in the median of the Dulles Airport Road and for a feasibility study of rapid transit to Friendship International Airport.
